portal.login.title: Login
portal.login.subtitle: Ericsson UDN Service
portal.login.termsOfUse.text: By logging in, you accept our
portal.login.sessionExpired.text: Due to inactivity you have been logged out. To continue your session please resubmit your username and password.
portal.login.setPassword.title: Set Password
portal.login.resetPassword.title: Reset Password
portal.login.2fa.verificationByApp.title: Verify Login
portal.login.2fa.verificationByAppHint.t: Waiting for verification. Use {app} to verify login for {username}.
portal.login.2fa.recoveryKey.title: Enter Recovery Key
portal.login.2fa.recoveryKey.keyRegenera: New one-time Recovery Key has been generated.
portal.login.2fa.havingTrouble.title: Trouble With Login?
portal.login.2fa.havingTrouble.voiceItem: Receive Verification Code from a Voice Call
portal.login.2fa.havingTrouble.supportHe: You can also get help at support.ericssonudn.com or contact your System Administator.
portal.login.localStorage.error.text: Portal doesn't support Safari in Private mode. Please turn off Private mode and try again.
